tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    has_genetic_data BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE genetic_research_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    gene_name VARCHAR(50),
    mutation_type VARCHAR(20),
    CONSTRAINT fk_patient_id FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_records(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PatientRecords (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PersonalizedMedicineStudies (
  study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES PatientRecords(patient_id),
  genetic_id INT REFERENCES GeneticData(genetic_id),
  study_description TEXT,
  study_results TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    dob DATE,
    gender CHAR(1),
    diagnosis TEXT
);
